appsgate.lig.context.proxy.impl
Class ContextProxyImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.context.proxy.impl.ContextProxyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextProxySpec
public class ContextProxyImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextProxySpec

This class is use to allow other components to subscribe for specific triggering event or request for system or devices state

Since:
May 28, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
